title: Kalista Buffs When?
body:
For crying out loud, her basic attacks only deal 90% of the damage...

Her w active does 0 damage which is totally trash I think the ghost screams should deal max hp true damage.

Her ulti does no damage just knocks up so either make the knockup last 2 more seconds and silence at the end, or make it deal max hp true damage!!

And sigh... Her E does like 0 damage at 1 stack. I think it should be changed entirely to deal 300/500/700/900/1100 true damage with 1 stack and multiply by 3 for each stack.

She finally becomes a good pick and maybe just maybe she'll be good enough to get the Victorious skin next year.
